013    package net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements;
014    
015    import java.util.Set;
016    
017    /**
018     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
019     */
020    public class ClassConfiguration extends ConfigurationElement
021    {
022            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
023    
024            /**
025             * class type
026             */
027            public Class< ? > type;
028    
029            /**
030             * object level constraints configuration
031             */
032            public ObjectConfiguration objectConfiguration;
033    
034            /**
035             * field constraints configuration
036             */
037            public Set<FieldConfiguration> fieldConfigurations;
038    
039            /**
040             * constructor constraints configuration
041             */
042            public Set<ConstructorConfiguration> constructorConfigurations;
043    
044            /**
045             * method constraints configuration
046             */
047            public Set<MethodConfiguration> methodConfigurations;
048    
049            /**
050             * Automatically apply field constraints to the corresponding parameters
051             * of constructors declared within the same class. A corresponding
052             * parameter is a parameter with the same name and type as the field.
053             */
054            public Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
055    
056            /**
057             * Automatically apply field constraints to the parameters of the
058             * corresponding setter methods declared within the same class. A
059             * corresponding setter method is a method following the JavaBean
060             * convention and its parameter has as the same type as the field.
061             */
062            public Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
063    
064            /**
065             * Declares if parameter values of constructors and methods are expected to be not null.
066             * This can be weakened by using the @net.sf.oval.constraint.exclusion.Nullable annotation on specific parameters.
067             */
068            public Boolean assertParametersNotNull;
069    
070            /**
071             * Specifies if invariants are checked prior and after calls to
072             * non-private methods and constructors.
073             */
074            public Boolean checkInvariants;
075    }
